SL
TRANSLATION.

Vochodu.

āru that gentleman
That gentleman Mr. Yekkanasale who has built a two-storeyed. palace, known as the House of Seats, has given orders to go on a hunting party. The man who has the charge of dogs will, of course join the party. They say that we should go to that forest called Hill of Mud, a forest never as yet approached by man for hunting. They say that we should go to those deeps for fishing, where never as yet man dared to fish. They have made a way for the hunting party. That Mr. Yekkanasale does all this.
